revised_title: Lysozyme's Mode of Action on Bacterial Cell Walls: Factors Affecting Susceptibility
tldr: This article discusses the factors affecting the susceptibility of bacterial cell walls to the action of lysozyme. It explores the structure and function of lysozyme and how various factors, such as O-acetyl groups, peptide side chains, and other polymers, influence its effectiveness. The study also highlights the importance of understanding these factors to develop better treatments against bacterial infections.
